summary: Ribbit anonymous site; UI refinement requested to adjust lily card hover background so it appears inset and better reveals rounded borders across pages (e.g., Pond page, homepage).

existing_features.title: Update the LilyCard hover styling so the light gray hover background appears slightly inset (smaller than the card/container) to better reveal the rounded borders of the feed container on pages that render lily lists (e.g., Home page and Pond page).
Ensure the inset hover effect does not interfere with LilyCard interactions (links, like button, share button, bookmark button), including pointer events and click targets.

new_feature_requests.summary: Make lily card hover light-gray background slightly inset/smaller than the container to better show rounded borders (across pages like Pond and homepage).
